review.title: “It has been pleasant.”
review.pros: Pros – I distributed menus. Great pay for such a small job.
review.cons: Cons – The maximum number of hours was only 15.

review.title: “Okay as a side job, but higher ups need to pay attention”
review.pros: Pros – Flex schedule, tips + minimum wage = decent pay for a college student, free food
review.cons: Cons – limited opportunities, multiple opinions from multiple owners who then go over the manager's head, they don't reimburse drivers for gas or wear & tear,
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Listen to your employees. They are dealing directly with the customers and will foresee any potential problems and issues should they arise. They know the best and most efficient ways to run the FoH and the kitchen, so listen!

review.title: “It was ok, it really depends on how the store manager runs the franchise store.”
review.pros: Pros – free food, career growth, training
review.cons: Cons – low tips, a lot of work,
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Good place to work”
review.pros: Pros – good service, team environment, provides a good reference
review.cons: Cons – there were no cons while working for Z Pizza
